content:
finally got around to start working on one coherent document about const generics with the goal of actually having a clear idea of what I want to achieve in the future. https://rust-lang.github.io/project-const-generics/design/index.html

Still figuring out how exactly I want to set this up so I would be very happy about feedback here
apparently mdbook disagrees between github and my local mdbook serve? that's annoying :sweat_smile: some of the links are currently broken :sparkles:
eyy lmao, thought i thought of pretty much all existing issues when finishing this yesterday
that sure was incorrect :sparkles:

lcnr said:

apparently mdbook disagrees between github and my local mdbook serve? that's annoying :sweat_smile: some of the links are currently broken :sparkles:

can you create an issue on the repo (if one doesn't exist). could look into later

I think the issue was with manually opening index.html instead of using the server from mdbook serve. The reason I did that is that mdbook serve first requires mdbook-skill-tree install. So I guess the only issue is that the error message only said "/home/lcnr/project-const-generics/skill-tree.css doesn't exist" which i just ignored cause it didn't make sense to me :sweat_smile:
don't think that's something you can fix necessarily?
probably not but if you have a workaround that's different from the "normal" workaround we could find a way to get that sorted
I don't :laughing: just used mdbook-skill-tree, so now everything works as expected ^^
